(Not applicable to Buffer characters.)

Applies the Mana Burn defuff when unequipped, decreasing MP -10% and -5,000 every sec.
- Mana Burn removed when a First Step weapon is equipped again.
- The Mana Burn debuff continues after resurrection by all means, including Life Token.
